description: Directed network infrastructure and virtualization engineering for IPTV services.
achievements: Directed network infrastructure upgrades for IPTV services, significantly improving streaming performance and stability.
Engineered KVM-based virtualization solutions, reducing infrastructure costs.
Managed multi-vendor network solutions (Juniper, Cisco, Extreme, Dell).
Upgraded network infrastructure to support IGMPv3 for PIM-SSM, improving network performance.
Completed data center migration and redesign, aligning with business objectives.
